Join us for our sales leadership webinar and other news from the Zoho CRM team.

The Monthly Forecast | February '18  
Go beyond communication and become a true sales leader.  
We at Zoho are constantly hosting new webinars to make your CRM experience easier. Join us and learn how to become a sales leader during our Sales Leadership Webinar series or learn from our product experts from one of our free weekly webinar sessions.  
 https://www.zoho.com/crm/webinars/  Training Webinars [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/webinars/ ]  https://www.zoho.com/crm/lp/webinars/sales-leadership/?utm_source=nl  Sales Leadership Webinar [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/lp/webinars/sales-leadership/?utm_source=nl ]    
    
We're coming to a city near you.

Community Digest  
 Check out the monthly Community Digest for a gist of all that’s happening in the Zoho CRM Community. It encompasses tips and tricks, CRM hacks, Custom functions and more.   
 https://help.zoho.com/portal/community/topic/community-digest-january-2018  More details here [ https://help.zoho.com/portal/community/topic/community-digest-january-2018 ]    
     

We're going for the gold.  
Zoho is a member of the American Association of Inside Sales Professionals. This year, we are in the running for the Top Service Provider award, but we need your help. Please take a moment to vote for Zoho CRM.  
 https://www.aa-isp.org/vendor/rate/394  Vote for us [ https://www.aa-isp.org/vendor/rate/394 ]    
      
Use your favorite extensions for 
Zoho CRM.    
  

GoToWebinar:  
Sync webinars and attendee lists from GoToWebinar to Zoho CRM.  https://marketplace.zoho.com/crm/gotowebinar?utm_source=crmsubmail  Read more [ https://marketplace.zoho.com/crm/gotowebinar?utm_source=crmsubmail ]  
  

SendinBlue:  
Manage your email marketing campaigns from your CRM.  https://marketplace.zoho.com/crm/sendinblue?utm_source=crmsubmail  Read more [ https://marketplace.zoho.com/crm/sendinblue?utm_source=crmsubmail ]     
     

How can you stay connected while on the go?  
A mobile CRM is not a downsized version of the desktop CRM. It’s a more specialized and dedicated platform aimed at higher productivity. Check out our ebooks library to learn more.  
 https://www.zoho.com/crm/resources/ebooks/  Download free Ebooks [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/resources/ebooks/ ]    
    
Questions for a good sales leader.  
Our blog is a great place to stay up to date on what's new in Zoho CRM and learn some fresh tips and tricks. Make sure you check out some of our favorite posts this month, including a guest post from our Sales Leadership Webinar Series host, Israel Greene:       
      

Sales Leadership: 5 questions that every good leader should be asking.  https://www.zoho.com/crm/blog/sales-leadership-five-questions.html  Read more [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/blog/sales-leadership-five-questions.html ]  
  

Make your CRM implementation better with Blueprint.  https://www.zoho.com/crm/blog/make-your-crm-implementation-better-with-blueprint.html  Read more [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/blog/make-your-crm-implementation-better-with-blueprint.html ]     
  
We have some big things in store for next month. Stay tuned!  
Cheers,  
The Zoho CRM Team

How Zoho CRM will help you sell smarter, better, and faster in 2018

We want to help you make 2018 the best sales year so far. Over the past 12 months we developed a bunch of useful new features, improvements and added many extensions. Take a look at what you can leverage to help you sell smarter, better, and faster.  
 
 50+  
New features   
 100+  
Marketplace extensions   
 1000+  
Customer meetups   
 4  
Product updates every week   
    
 
 
 
 

Blueprint
---------
 
Build, execute, and replicate your sales process from start to finish with Blueprints.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/blueprint/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/blueprint/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Zia
---
 
Get performance-based interpretations, solutions, and predictions for your team from Zia, our AI powered sales assistant.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zia/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zia/?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 
 

Workflow rules:                Multiple conditions
--------------------------------------------------
 
To automate routine tasks, Zoho CRM has workflow rules that make every single workday productive. With this year's new update, you can set up to 10 conditions per workflow rule.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/manage-workflow.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/manage-workflow.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Sticky Notes
------------
 
Quickly make a to-do list of tasks to complete, and set reminders to follow up.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/sticky-notes.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/sticky-notes.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 
 

Automated lead generation from social media
-------------------------------------------
 
Automatically add customers as leads or contacts into your CRM and expand the power of your social presence.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/social/social-tab.html?src=crm2018newsletter#Automate_Leads  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/social/social-tab.html?src=crm2018newsletter#Automate_Leads ]   
  
  
 

Finance plus integration
------------------------
 
Your team can track their own expenses, as well as the transaction, order, and subscription statuses of your customers.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-finance-suite/usage.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-finance-suite/usage.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 

Advanced filters get real time
------------------------------
 
Get a real-time count of how many leads have opened your email, or how many leads you need to follow up with.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/advanced-filters.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/advanced-filters.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
 
 

Scoring rules
-------------
 
Score every lead that comes into your CRM for faster and more meaningful conversations.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/scoring-rules.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/scoring-rules.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
    
 
 
  
 

SalesSignals Platform
---------------------
 
Get real-time notifications for various activities, like customer interactions on social media, email actions, and third-party integrations delivered right into your CRM.   https://www.zoho.com/developer/help/extensions/sales-signal-platform.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/developer/help/extensions/sales-signal-platform.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
  
 
 

Marketplace and extensions
--------------------------
 
80+ extensions that include LinkedIn's Sales Navigator, Google Chrome, Office 365, Shopify, and more.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
    
 
 
 
 

Telephony
---------
 
We've partnered with 24 major providers to bring every salesperson's phone conversation inside CRM.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-phonebridge/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-phonebridge/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Slack integration
-----------------
 
Share reports, receive SalesSignals and reminder notifications, and look up specific records, right from your Slack Channel.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/slack.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/slack.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
What's the point of all the best features in the world  if they can't be used well?           Let's see how much some of Zoho CRM's features were used.  
 
 
182 Million  
SalesSignals processed    
 
2 Million  
Sticky notes   
 
6.5 Million  
Blueprint triggers   
 
53,000  
Workflows created   
 
98,000  
Advanced filters saved   
    
 
  

We met 1000s of customers face-to-face and online!
--------------------------------------------------
 
Introducing our exclusive online forum for all Zoho CRM users to ask questions, offer tips and tricks, and connect not only with product experts from Zoho but with each other.   https://forums.zoho.com/topic/community-digest-december-2017  Learn More >> [ https://forums.zoho.com/topic/community-digest-december-2017 ] 
    
 
 

We've got even bigger plans for 2018. Stay tuned!
-------------------------------------------------

How Zoho CRM will help you sell smarter, better, and faster in 2018

We want to help you make 2018 the best sales year so far. Over the past 12 months we developed a bunch of useful new features, improvements and added many extensions. Take a look at what you can leverage to help you sell smarter, better, and faster.  
 
 50+  
New features   
 100+  
Marketplace extensions   
 1000+  
Customer meetups   
 4  
Product updates every week   
    
 
 
 
 

Blueprint
---------
 
Build, execute, and replicate your sales process from start to finish with Blueprints.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/blueprint/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/blueprint/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Zia
---
 
Get performance-based interpretations, solutions, and predictions for your team from Zia, our AI powered sales assistant.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zia/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zia/?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 
 

Workflow rules:                Multiple conditions
--------------------------------------------------
 
To automate routine tasks, Zoho CRM has workflow rules that make every single workday productive. With this year's new update, you can set up to 10 conditions per workflow rule.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/manage-workflow.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/manage-workflow.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Sticky Notes
------------
 
Quickly make a to-do list of tasks to complete, and set reminders to follow up.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/sticky-notes.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/sticky-notes.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 
 

Automated lead generation from social media
-------------------------------------------
 
Automatically add customers as leads or contacts into your CRM and expand the power of your social presence.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/social/social-tab.html?src=crm2018newsletter#Automate_Leads  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/social/social-tab.html?src=crm2018newsletter#Automate_Leads ]   
  
  
 

Finance plus integration
------------------------
 
Your team can track their own expenses, as well as the transaction, order, and subscription statuses of your customers.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-finance-suite/usage.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-finance-suite/usage.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
 

Advanced filters get real time
------------------------------
 
Get a real-time count of how many leads have opened your email, or how many leads you need to follow up with.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/advanced-filters.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/advanced-filters.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
 
 

Scoring rules
-------------
 
Score every lead that comes into your CRM for faster and more meaningful conversations.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/scoring-rules.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/automation/scoring-rules.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
    
 
 
  
 

SalesSignals Platform
---------------------
 
Get real-time notifications for various activities, like customer interactions on social media, email actions, and third-party integrations delivered right into your CRM.   https://www.zoho.com/developer/help/extensions/sales-signal-platform.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/developer/help/extensions/sales-signal-platform.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
  
 
 

Marketplace and extensions
--------------------------
 
80+ extensions that include LinkedIn's Sales Navigator, Google Chrome, Office 365, Shopify, and more.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
    
 
 
 
 

Telephony
---------
 
We've partnered with 24 major providers to bring every salesperson's phone conversation inside CRM.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-phonebridge/?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/zoho-phonebridge/?src=crm2018newsletter ]   
  
  
 

Slack integration
-----------------
 
Share reports, receive SalesSignals and reminder notifications, and look up specific records, right from your Slack Channel.   https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/slack.html?src=crm2018newsletter  Learn How >> [ https://www.zoho.com/crm/help/extensions/slack.html?src=crm2018newsletter ]  
    
 
 
What's the point of all the best features in the world  if they can't be used well?           Let's see how much some of Zoho CRM's features were used.

We met 1000s of customers face-to-face and online!

Upcoming Droplet Reboots (Action Recommended)

Hello,

 DigitalOcean is working to mitigate the industry-wide security vulnerabilities known as Meltdown and Spectre. More information about the Meltdown and Spectre vulnerabilities can be found on our blog <https://blog.digitalocean.com/a-message-about-intel-security-findings/>. 

 This email is to notify you that, as part of our mitigation efforts, we have planned an upcoming maintenance that will affect all Droplets in all regions. During the course of this maintenance, we will reboot physical machines and the Droplets on them. These reboots are necessary in order to apply the patches that mitigate the Spectre vulnerability within DigitalOcean’s infrastructure. 

 Users must also apply patches on their own Droplets. To patch and protect your Droplets, we strongly recommend you follow the steps outlined in this article <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-protect-your-server-against-the-meltdown-and-spectre-vulnerabilities> to ensure your Droplet is 
running an updated kernel, even if the migration is only partial. 

 We recommend taking a backup or snapshot <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/digitalocean-backups-and-snapshots-explained> of critical data before making changes to a production system, and verifying your recovery plan ahead of all maintenance windows.

 If your distribution is not listed as 
patched, we highly recommend you move your data to a new Droplet running a version that is receiving security updates. 

 To simplify the act of patching, we have recently updated Droplets to utilize a GrubLoader <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-update-a-digitalocean-server-s-kernel>. On certain legacy Droplets, this may cause issues if the kernel is not upgraded <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-protect-your-server-against-the-meltdown-and-spectre-vulnerabilities>.

 We are aiming to begin this maintenance in our NYC1 region during the week of January 29, with maintenance to 
follow in our other global regions. Notices, including a list of affected Droplets, will be sent to all affected customers at least 24 hours ahead of scheduled maintenance windows. 

 We recognize the disruptive nature of this maintenance and will make every effort to provide as much advance notice as possible. We are exploring ways to reduce the impact of this kind of maintenance in the future. 

 If you need assistance planning for this maintenance, or have any other questions, please reach out by opening up a support ticket <https://cloudsupport.digitalocean.com/s/>. 

 Thank you,
 Team DigitalOcean

OSF Has Some New Storage Options!

View this email in your browser (http://mailchi.mp/osf/osf-has-some-new-storage-options?e=7c8231dad2)


** We integrate with 2 new add-ons!
------------------------------------------------------------

Attention OSF'ers,

We've added support for two more storage options on OSF: GitLab and OneDrive. If you use these tools to manage your research, you can now easily connect these accounts to your OSF projects. See below for more details.
GitLab

GitLab is an open-source, web-based git repository manager. You can link one repository per project. Different repositories can be linked to different components within the same project. The connection with GitLab is read-only, which means files added to your GitLab repository will be viewable -- but not editable -- via OSF.
OneDrive

OneDrive is a cloud-based storage service part of the Microsoft suite of tools that allows you to store and share files. You can connect one OneDrive folder or subfolder per project. Different folders can be linked to different components within the same project. The connection with OneDrive is read-only, which means files added to your OneDrive folder will be viewable -- but not editable -- via OSF.

A Message about AMS2

Hello,

Following the launch of our new pricing plans, we have seen a significant uptick of usage in our AMS2 region and we have currently reached maximum capacity at the datacenter. As a result, we have disabled new Droplet creation in the region. 

 Though we are making efforts to free up space on our servers, we are unable to add more capacity as we remain restricted by the size of the facility. We anticipate that some users will destroy their AMS2 Droplets, freeing up space in the region, but we are unable to predict how much space that will create, and how quickly that might happen. We encourage you to consider migrating your data <https://www.digitalocean.com/help/technical/product/#how-can-i-move-my-virtual-server-or-make-my-snapshot-available-in-another-datacenter> to our AMS3 region - which houses newer hardware and more features, like Block Storage - or to one of our other nearby regions like LON1 or FRA1. 

 For more information about migrating your Droplets to a new region, you can refer to this tutorial on our Community site <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-migrate-digitalocean-droplets-using-snapshots>. 

Thank you,
Team DigitalOcean

Spaces now in Singapore (SGP1)

We’re excited to announce that Spaces, DigitalOcean’s standalone object storage solution, is now available in Singapore (SGP1) <http://blog.digitalocean.com/spaces-available-in-sgp1?utm_medium=email&utm_source=local&utm_campaign=SGP1Spaces>. Users have stored more than one billion objects since Spaces launched in September 2017. SGP1 is the third datacenter with Spaces, following NYC3 and AMS3. 

 Create as many Spaces as you want for a simple $5 per month price which includes 250GB of storage and 1TB of outbound bandwidth. There are no costs per request and additional storage is priced at the lowest rate available: $0.01 per GB transferred and $0.02 per GB stored. Uploads are free. 

 Spaces is not only designed to scale automatically with your application data, but it can also provide a cost savings of up to 10x through predictable pricing and no surprises on your monthly bill.

Upcoming Droplet Reboots (Action Recommended)

Hello,

 DigitalOcean is working to mitigate the industry-wide security vulnerabilities known as Meltdown and Spectre. More information about the Meltdown and Spectre vulnerabilities can be found on our blog <https://blog.digitalocean.com/a-message-about-intel-security-findings/>. 

 This email is to notify you that, as part of our mitigation efforts, we have planned an upcoming maintenance that will affect all Droplets in all regions. During the course of this maintenance, we will reboot physical machines and the Droplets on them. These reboots are necessary in order to apply the patches that mitigate the Spectre vulnerability within DigitalOcean’s infrastructure. 

 Users must also apply patches on their own Droplets. To patch and protect your Droplets, we strongly recommend you follow the steps outlined in this article <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-protect-your-server-against-the-meltdown-and-spectre-vulnerabilities> to ensure your Droplet is 
running an updated kernel, even if the migration is only partial. 

 We recommend taking a backup or snapshot <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/digitalocean-backups-and-snapshots-explained> of critical data before making changes to a production system, and verifying your recovery plan ahead of all maintenance windows.

 If your distribution is not listed as 
patched, we highly recommend you move your data to a new Droplet running a version that is receiving security updates. 

 To simplify the act of patching, we have recently updated Droplets to utilize a GrubLoader <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-update-a-digitalocean-server-s-kernel>. On certain legacy Droplets, this may cause issues if the kernel is not upgraded <https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-protect-your-server-against-the-meltdown-and-spectre-vulnerabilities>.

 We are aiming to begin this maintenance in our NYC1 region during the week of January 29, with maintenance to 
follow in our other global regions. Notices, including a list of affected Droplets, will be sent to all affected customers at least 24 hours ahead of scheduled maintenance windows. 

 We recognize the disruptive nature of this maintenance and will make every effort to provide as much advance notice as possible. We are exploring ways to reduce the impact of this kind of maintenance in the future. 

 If you need assistance planning for this maintenance, or have any other questions, please reach out by opening up a support ticket <https://cloudsupport.digitalocean.com/s/>. 

 Thank you,
 Team DigitalOcean
